Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives
Susan Bondurant Papers
Bondurant, Susan
TAM.230
3 Linear Feet 3 boxes
1971-1990 1 2 3
Access Restrictions
Open for research without restrictions.
Use Restrictions
Copyright (and related rights to publicity and privacy) to materials in this collection created by Susan Bondurant are held by Susan Bondurant. Permission to publish or reproduce materials to which s/he holds copyright must be secured from the copyright holder. Please contact the Tamiment Library for assistance with contacting Susan Bondurant.
Immediate Source of Acquisition
Provenance unknown, but we have reason to believe that Susan Bondurant sent a gift of Freedom Socialist Party materials from 1971-1990. The accession number associated with this collection is 1950.190.
